payload.text: We take our responsibility seriously. If you think you have been a victim of fraud, please call 1300 784 207 (or +612 9155 4029 if calling from overseas) from 8:30am to 6.30pm, Monday to Friday (Sydney time), so one of our consultants can assist you.
